title: Today’s hot topics on Relevant Radio: Abortion pills on campus, sex-abuse impacts, teen suicide in Colorado, Kavanaugh, Trudeau, and more!
text:
Once again, I get to step outside the box and guest host the Drew Mariani Show on Relevant Radio® from 3-6 ET today! The Catholic talk-radio network is heard nationwide on the air, as well as online and through their free mobile app that plays live and podcast shows.

Today’s Relevant Radio® show includes:

Father Barry O’Sullivan joins us from the UK to discuss the impact of the sex-abuse scandal on law-abiding priests

Duane “Generalissimo” Patterson will talk about the media credibility crisis in the Kavanaugh scandal and discuss the ramifications of Justin Trudeau’s blackface crisis

Deacon Basil Ryan Balke connects the dots on a sudden sharp increase in teen suicide in Colorado and recent changes for assisted suicide

Peter Grandich returns to take a look at the markets — and football!

Will California’s legislature require college campuses to stock up on abortion pills? Timmerie Geagea joins us to discuss

And more to come … stay tuned!

We may add more before the show starts today, plus we will have the chaplet of Divine Mercy in the second hour. We will also take your calls at 1-888-914-9149. You can also listen on the Relevant Radio® app no matter where you are in the world, so download it now. I’ll look forward to talking with you!
